verses.verse: Simon <S%G4826><s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to them that have <S%G2975>obtained<s%> like <S%G2472>precious<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

According <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> hath <S%G1433>given<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> pertain <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of him that hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1223>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> virtue: <S%G703><s%>

Whereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1433>given<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> exceeding <S%G3176>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G1862>promises:<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> ye might <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G5449>nature,<s%> having <S%G668>escaped<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5356>corruption<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G1939>lust.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> beside <S%G846>this,<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3923>giving<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence,<s%> <S%G2023>add<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G703>virtue;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1466>temperance;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G1466>temperance<s%> <S%G5281>patience;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>kindness;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>kindness<s%> <S%G26>charity.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G5225>be<s%> in <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4121>abound,<s%> they <S%G2525>make<s%> you that ye shall <S%G3756>neither<s%> be <S%G692>barren<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3739>he<s%> that <S%G3918>lacketh<s%> <S%G3361><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and cannot see afar <S%G3467>off,<s%> and hath <S%G2983>forgotten<s%> <S%G3024><s%> that he was <S%G2512>purged<s%> from <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3819>old<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> the <S%G3123>rather,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1589>election<s%> <S%G949>sure:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> if ye <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> ye shall <S%G3364>never<s%> <S%G4218><s%> fall: <S%G4417><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> an <S%G1529>entrance<s%> shall be ministered <S%G2023>unto<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4146>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I will <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G272>negligent<s%> to put you always in <S%G5279>remembrance<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G104><s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things,<s%> <S%G2539>though<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> them, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G4741>established<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

Yea, <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2233>think<s%> it <S%G1342>meet,<s%> as long <S%G1909>as<s%> <S%G3745><s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4638>tabernacle,<s%> to stir you <S%G1326>up<s%> <S%G5209><s%> by putting you in <S%G1722>remembrance;<s%> <S%G5280><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5031>shortly<s%> I <S%G2076>must<s%> put <S%G595>off<s%> this <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4638>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> hath <S%G1213>showed<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G4704>endeavor<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be able <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1841>decease<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> <S%G1539>always<s%> in <S%G4160>remembrance.<s%> <S%G3420><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1811>followed<s%> cunningly <S%G4679>devised<s%> <S%G3454>fables,<s%> when we made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2030>eyewitnesses<s%> of <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G3168>majesty.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> when there <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G5107>such<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5259>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3169>excellent<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am well <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> which <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> when we <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3735>mount.<s%>

We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a more <S%G949>sure<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G4397>prophecy;<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> that ye take <S%G4337>heed,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto a <S%G3088>light<s%> that <S%G5316>shineth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G850>dark<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3757><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1306>dawn,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the day <S%G5459>star<s%> <S%G393>arise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%>

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> of any <S%G2398>private<s%> <S%G1955>interpretation.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in old <S%G4218>time<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G444>man:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> as they were <S%G5342>moved<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
